meanings.definition: A cartilaginous fish of the subclass Elasmobranchii, which includes sharks, rays, and skates.
meanings.sent1: The elasmobranch swam gracefully through the ocean.
meanings.sent2: I saw an elasmobranch at the aquarium last weekend.
meanings.sent3: The elasmobranch tried to do a somersault but ended up doing a belly flop.
meanings.sent4: Her sleek movements in the water reminded me of an elasmobranch.
meanings.sent5: The elasmobranch's sharp teeth made it a fearsome predator.
